title: OK, Here's When The Last The Rise Of Skywalker Trailer Drops
text:
Now kiss. (Image: Disney/Lucasfilm)

Don’t pretend you don’t want to know.

I can already hear the objections: “is an announcement of a release date for a preview of a movie” really something worth making a post over? This ain’t it, Gizmodo! And normally, I’d agree with you. But it’s the last mainline Star Wars movie. The end of the Skywalker saga. And this is its last big trailer. An entertainment moment like this might not ever happen again. So I know some of you are dying to find out: when’s it coming? The wait is almost over.

The final trailer. Tune in to Monday Night Football on @ESPN to watch it live. #TheRiseOfSkywalker pic.twitter.com/QAme0H5j0D — Star Wars (@starwars) October 19, 2019

This Tuesday, during a football game, because it’s always a football game, ESPN will be airing the final trailer for Star Wars Episode IX: The Rise of Skywalker. I imagine it’ll also go online right after, if you’re not in the mood to sit down for a heaping helping of American Monday Night Football.

Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker hits theatres December 19, 2019.
description: Don’t pretend you don’t want to know.
